import React, { useState } from "react" import "./add-event-modal.css" import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next' import ReCAPTCHA from "react-google-recaptcha"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faFileUpload, faPlus, faTimes } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; function AddEventModal(props){ const [state, setState] = useState({ title:"", date:"", startTime:"", endTime:"", eventURL:"", category:null, }) const { t } = useTranslation() const handleChange = (event) => { const {name, value} = event.target setState(prevState => ({ ...prevState, [name]: value })) } const handleClose = (event) => { if(event.target === event.currentTarget) props.handleHideAddEvent() } return(
